function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Influence of fear of covid-19 on travel intentions and behavior","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tourism leading to negative environmental and social costs","category":"Tourism","confidence":"High"},{"name":"General anxiety leading to low-risk vacation choices","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited geographical scope may limit generalizability of findings to other populations.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of behaviors studied in relation to covid-19 and travel anxiety.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for effective approaches to reduce travel-related risk perception and anxiety due to covid-19 and similar health risk situations.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in contact rates based on age, sex, employment status, and other characteristics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding driven by urbanization and mobility patterns increasing the growth-rate and size of infectious outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inferred mobility patterns based on high-resolution maps of residential density","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous contact networks through which diseases are spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expected number of si contacts occurring at specific locations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calculating the reproductive number in the context of disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction between susceptible subgroup and infectives with age-specific transmission potential","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linear relationship between contact rates and visitor density","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial variations in the basic reproduction number r0","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased contact rates in downtown residents led to 50% more efficient spread of pathogens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wave-like patterns of disease spread emanating from city center","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistical dependence of disease spread on distance from city’s largest retail hub","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocating businesses, schools, and housing across cities with unique transportation networks may impact the growth rate and evolution of epidemics.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal roles of individuals in disease spreading based on location","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in efficiency of vaccination campaigns based on location","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in health impacts across different neighborhoods due to remote influence of people in other neighborhoods and characteristics of places where interactions occur.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for rapid transmission of pathogens across distant neighborhoods due to uneven distribution of activity hubs in a city.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of isolation of the effects of spatial heterogeneity from all other information embedded in massive mobility datasets used as model input.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralization of daily activities in hyper-affluent areas leading to potential interaction among people from all parts of the city.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distributions of daily activities can lead to segregated subsets of the population, increasing the growth rate of infectious outbreaks.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralization of daily activities can result in higher r0 for urban epidemics, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effect on children’s r0 due to the breakup of activity hubs, potentially leading to targeted spread of contagious diseases among children.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate mobility parameters due to lack of real origin-destination data","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accessibility of massive mobility datasets","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for asymptomatic periods in disease spread modeling","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of reactive behavior in disease spread modeling","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of time-varying mobility matrices in disease spread analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of mobility and contact data for infants and children at different educational stages","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unaccounted variations in mobility parameters for infected individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate existing transport policy approaches to respond to the new challenges posed by covid-19.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic travelers exporting infection undetected across international borders","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 to most countries on earth","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on online shopping and home deliveries","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging people to return to work and use private vehicles may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission in public spaces.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the efficacy and public acceptance of safety interventions in public transport","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of the effects of mobility and travel behavior on disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of responsible transport concept","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly changing policy and service environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New technological and service innovations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traveling for work-related activities increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Struggles in promoting public transport due to social distancing measures","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on individual responsibility may lead to a lack of oversight and regulation in ensuring safety and hygiene standards in public transport and shared mobility.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"}]}
